REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f8261 reute b f BC-MUNICIPALITY-OF-TORON 03-18 0077

TEXT.TITLE: MUNICIPALITY OF TORONTO ISSUES CANADIAN DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: The Municipality of Metropolitan Toronto is issuing a 75 mln Canadian dlr eurobond due May 7, 1997 paying 8-3/4 pct and priced at 101-1/8 pct, lead manager Wood Gundy Inc said. The bond will be listed in Luxembourg and is available in denominations of 1,000 dlrs. Fees comprise 1-1/4 pct selling concession and 3/8 pct each for management and underwriting. Pay date is May 7. REUTER
